oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veterans and family members.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Confederate veterans and family members ca. 1921. Written on back "Fair Grounds" 1921. Cpl. James Calvin Carnahan, Co. G, 8th Tenn. (Smith's) Cav. Regt., CSA of Rutherford County, Tenn. is on the third row, standing on the left. He is wearing a dark suit, dark hat, and dark glasses. The 8th Tenn. (Smith's) Cav. Regt., CSA served most of the war under Gen. Joseph Wheeler and saw extensive action with the Army of Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carnahan, James Calvin
